Here are the cities that have direct flights:
Paris and Hamburg, Valencia and Warsaw, Paris and Valencia, Naples and Warsaw, Krakow and Warsaw, Valencia and Naples, Hamburg and Salzburg, Warsaw and Hamburg, Paris and Warsaw, Paris and Krakow, Paris and Naples, Krakow and Valencia.
